entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kapuskasing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:11 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 7.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kapuskasing Airport 5:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 7.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 49 %
Dewpoint: -2.5°C
Wind: SSW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow mixed with rain. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or rain. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the morning. High plus 2 with temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 27. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of snow. Low minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
